author: tatuvlakia
title: Nice Little Set, excellent level crossing piece.
review:
An excellent early train set.

Most crucially, the level crossing plate/ramp piece has forwards-compatibility with newer train sets such as 7745 with the center power track having a place instead of a removable long plate in the middle of the level crossing.

It is from the pre-minifig era, yet could be easily modded.

Not much else, just a very nice complement to a nice train-town combo.
